item.title: Presidio 将通过 6.6 亿美元的 SPAC 合并在美国上市
item.description: 油气井效率公司 Presidio Investment Holdings LLC 已同意与空白支票公司 EQV Ventures Acquisition Corp. 合并，合并后的实体价值约为 6.6 亿美元。【原文：Oil and gas well efficiency company Presidio Investment Holdings LLC has agreed to merge with blank-check firm EQV Ventures Acquisition Corp. in a deal that values the combined entity at about $660 million.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 Eclipse 在押注特斯拉和 Rivian 之后聘用了 T. Rowe 的老将 Fath
item.description: 专注于制造业等现实世界行业初创企业的风险投资公司 Eclipse 已聘请 T. Rowe Price Group Inc.Rowe Price Group Inc. 投资者 Joe Fath 担任合伙人兼增长主管。【原文：Eclipse, a venture capital firm focused on startups in real-world industries like manufacturing, has hired longtime T. Rowe Price Group Inc. investor Joe Fath as partner and head of growth.】

item.title: Tripadvisor 持有人 Palliser 敦促进行战略审查，可能出售公司
item.description: Palliser Capital 正敦促 Tripadvisor Inc. 探索潜在的出售方案，这给这家已经面临另一名高调股东激进分子的旅游预订和点评网站带来了更大的压力。【原文：Palliser Capital is urging Tripadvisor Inc. to explore a potential sale, heaping pressure on the travel booking and review site that’s already facing another high-profile shareholder activist.】

item.title: 布隆迪大城市水龙头干涸，洪水风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 布隆迪最大城市的供水管道系统已经瘫痪，居民只能用水桶到中心取水点和河流取水。【原文：The water-pipeline system in the biggest cities in Burundi has collapsed, with residents resorting to taking buckets to central pickup points and rivers to obtain the basic commodity.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦卢比创一年多来最长连涨纪录
item.description: 在巴基斯坦央行表示将放缓购买美元以建立外汇储备之后，巴基斯坦卢比创下了自去年 4 月以来最长的日连涨记录。【原文：Pakistan’s rupee recorded its longest daily streak of gains since April last year after the central bank said it will slow buying of dollars to build its foreign exchange reserves.】

item.title: 进口下降导致美国贸易逆差缩小至 2023 年以来最紧水平
item.description: 美国贸易赤字在 6 月份收窄至 2023 年 9 月以来最紧张的水平，原因是企业在今年早些时候进口大幅激增后缩减了进口。【原文：The US trade deficit narrowed in June to the tightest since September 2023 as companies scaled back on imports after a massive surge earlier in the year.】

item.title: 布隆迪推选财政部长恩塔洪图耶为新总理
item.description: 布隆迪国民议会在内斯特-恩塔洪图耶被任命为财政部长仅八个月后，选举他为新总理。【原文：Burundi’s National Assembly has elected Nestor Ntahontuye as the new prime minister, just eight months after he was named finance minister.】

item.title: 加拿大货物贸易逆差因机械进口而扩大
item.description: 加拿大商品贸易逆差在第二季度创下历史新高，6 月份的进出口差距有所扩大。【原文：Canada’s merchandise trade deficit reached a record high in the second quarter, with June’s gap between exports and imports expanding.】

item.title: OpenAI、谷歌和 Anthropic 赢得美国批准的民用人工智能合同
item.description: 美国政府的中央采购部门正在将OpenAI、Alphabet公司旗下的谷歌和Anthropic公司列入批准的人工智能供应商名单，这为民用联邦机构广泛采用人工智能技术打开了大门。【原文：The US government’s central purchasing arm is adding OpenAI, Alphabet Inc.’s Google and Anthropic to a list of approved artificial intelligence vendors, opening the door to widespread adoption of the technology across civilian federal agencies.】

item.title: 企业在财报电话会议中吹捧特朗普税收法案带来的更多投资和订单
item.description: 企业纷纷称赞唐纳德-特朗普总统的新税法促进了消费能力。【原文：Companies are praising President Donald Trump’s new tax law as a boost to spending power.】

item.title: 汉莎航空退出入股欧洲航空的谈判
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）放弃了入股欧洲航空公司（Air Europa）的谈判，土耳其航空公司（Turkish Airlines）成为这家西班牙航空公司仅存的竞购者，此前法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）也退出了谈判，而国际航空集团（IAG SA）也两次被拒绝收购控股权。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG has abandoned negotiations to take a stake in Air Europa, leaving Turkish Airlines as the only remaining bidder for the Spanish airline after Air France-KLM also withdrew and IAG SA was denied twice to buy a holding.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德以 60 亿美元收购杜克能源佛罗里达公用事业公司股权
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）同意以 60 亿美元的价格收购杜克能源公司（Duke Energy Corp.【原文：Brookfield Asset Management agreed to buy a 19.7% stake in Duke Energy Corp.’s Florida utility for $6 billion, a deal that will accelerate investment in the grid as the state’s population soars.】

item.title: 双线资本认为美元有进一步下挫的空间
item.description: 双线资本（DoubleLine Capital）投资组合经理比尔-坎贝尔（Bill Campbell）认为，美元已经做好了进一步下跌的准备，而愿意迅速降息的美联储新主席的任命可能会成为催化剂。【原文：The dollar is primed to fall a lot further and the appointment of a new Federal Reserve chair who’s willing to cut interest rates quickly could be the catalyst, according to Bill Campbell, portfolio manager at DoubleLine Capital.】

item.title: 巴西央行称美国关税加剧了谨慎的必要性
item.description: 巴西央行表示，在努力控制高于目标的通胀率的同时，将对货币政策保持谨慎立场，并警告美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易关税将导致更高的不确定性。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said it will keep a cautious stance on monetary policy as it works to tame above-target inflation, warning of higher uncertainty caused by US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs.】

item.title: 新西兰房价连续第四个月下跌
item.description: 新西兰房价连续第四个月下跌，原因是经济增长乏力和失业率上升使购房者持观望态度。【原文：New Zealand house prices fell for a fourth straight month as sluggish economic growth and rising unemployment keep buyers on the sidelines.】

item.title: 价格疲软，卢布坚挺，俄罗斯石油收入减少三分之一
item.description: 由于全球原油价格下跌和国家货币升值，7 月份俄罗斯国家预算中的石油收入比一年前减少了三分之一。【原文：Russia’s proceeds from oil in the state budget shrank by a third from a year ago in July following a drop in global crude prices and the appreciation of the nation’s currency.】

item.title: 非洲最大证券交易所首席执行官称考虑 24 小时交易
item.description: 非洲最大的证券交易所正在考虑引入 24 小时交易，JSE Ltd. 的首席执行官说。【原文：Africa’s largest stock exchange is considering introducing 24-hour trading, the JSE Ltd.’s chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 沙特钢铁公司为债务重组寻找顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯 Al Ittefaq 钢铁产品公司在与包括主要债权人 Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP 在内的债务人进行预期谈判之前，已向重组顾问寻求建议。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Al Ittefaq Steel Products Co. has sought proposals from restructuring advisers, according to people familiar with the matter, ahead of expected talks with debtholders including major creditor Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP.】

item.title: 国际社会保障协会称，英国投资者应拒绝保险交易
item.description: 据 ISS 称，丹-勒布（Dan Loeb）的对冲基金 Third Point 经营的英国投资信托公司的股东应拒绝其将自身转变为再保险公司的计划。【原文：Shareholders of the UK investment trust run by Dan Loeb’s hedge fund Third Point should reject its plan to turn itself into a reinsurance company, according to ISS.】

item.title: 伊姆兰-汗党开始新一轮巴基斯坦抗议活动，领导人身陷囹圄
item.description: 巴基斯坦前总理伊姆兰-汗（Imran Khan）领导的政党开始在全国范围内举行新一轮抗议活动，直至该国恢复所谓的 "民主"。【原文：Pakistan’s former Prime Minister Imran Khan’s party started new protests nationwide until what it called “democracy is restored” in the country, eight months after similar demonstrations turned deadly.】

item.title: 美国需要提高液化天然气产量以满足贸易协议要求
item.description:
外国领导人承诺购买美国能源，但该行业目前无法满足这一需求。【原文：

Foreign leaders are promising to buy American energy, but the industry can’t meet that demand right now.

】

item.title: 巴西产量增加，需求不振，白糖接近两周低点
item.description: 纽约原糖期货跌至近两周来的最低点，原因是在主要进口国的新买盘仍然有限的情况下，人们担心最大种植国巴西的供应量会膨胀。【原文：Raw sugar futures in New York fell to the lowest in nearly two weeks on concerns over swelling supplies in top grower Brazil at a time when fresh buying from major importers remains limited.】

item.title: 热浪压迫反应堆产量，法国电价飙升
item.description: 法国电力价格升至 3 月份以来的最高点，原因是人们担心本周在全国范围内掀起的热浪可能会抑制法国核反应堆的发电量。【原文：French power prices rose to their highest since March on concern that a heat wave building across the country this week could curb output from its fleet of nuclear reactors.】

item.title: Attestor 校友皮特罗-斯特拉（Pietro Stella）开设基金，筹资 2.5 亿欧元
item.description: Fedaia Partners 是一家总部位于伦敦的另类投资公司，由前 Attestor 合伙人 Pietro Stella 于 2020 年创立，该公司正寻求在其首次外部融资中筹集 2.5 亿欧元（约合 2.89 亿美元）。【原文：Fedaia Partners, a London-based alternative investment firm founded by former Attestor partner Pietro Stella in 2020, is seeking to raise €250 million ($289 million) in its first external fundraising.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性持续存在，农作物贸易商 ADM 下调前景展望
item.description: 阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. cut its outlook for the year as the crop trader navigates tariffs uncertainty, with profits hit by a lack of clarity on biofuels policy earlier this year.】

item.title: 特朗普加强威胁后印度转向损害控制
item.description: 印度政府正竭力控制唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁采取关税行动所带来的经济影响，这让新德里的官员们不知如何应对。【原文：India’s government is scrambling to contain the economic fallout from President Donald Trump’s threatened tariff action, which has left officials in New Delhi reeling on how to respond.】

item.title: Scatec 和 Stanlib 合资公司 Lyra 获得南非电力交易许可证
item.description: 为工业供电的可再生能源平台 Lyra Energy 已获得南非电力交易许可证。【原文：Lyra Energy, a renewable energy platform supplying power to industries, has been granted an electricity trading license in South Africa.】

item.title: 创原药业称本周接受香港上市订单
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，广州因诺制药集团股份有限公司计划最快于本周接受投资者订单，在香港进行首次公开募股。【原文：Guangzhou Innogen Pharmaceutical Group Co. plans to take investor orders as soon as this week for its initial public offering in Hong Kong, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储投票结构提高了特朗普支持利率的门槛
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们将关注玛丽亚-埃洛伊萨-卡普罗（Maria Eloisa Capurro）和乔纳勒-马尔特（Jonnelle Marte）关于 2026 年美联储的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at reporting by Maria Eloisa Capurro and Jonnelle Marte on the Fed in 2026. item.title: 几内亚将阿联酋全球采矿权转让给国营公司
item.description: 几内亚已将属于当地阿联酋全球铝业公司（Emirates Global Aluminium）的铝土矿开采租约转让给一家新成立的国有公司。【原文：Guinea has transfered a bauxite mining lease belonging to the local unit of Emirates Global Aluminium to a newly created state-owned company.】
